about_section.title: Beyond the Code
about_section.subtitle: I'm not just a developer; I'm a problem solver, a gamer, and a lifelong learner. Here's a glimpse into my world.
about_section.bio: I am a passionate <1>Full Stack Developer</1> based in Montreal. I specialize in building scalable web applications and intuitive user interfaces. My journey started with a curiosity for how things work, and now I architect digital solutions.
